title: Staffing Ratio Breach: Cross-Facility Workforce Cascade

dlr.decision: Activate agency staffing for General; restore Community L&D contracts; implement cross-facility allocation model
dlr.decided_by: Chief Nursing Officer + VP Operations + General Counsel

alternatives_rejected.description: Divert Community patients to General to consolidate staffing
alternatives_rejected.rejection_reason: Community L&D patients cannot be safely transferred mid-labor; creates new clinical risk

rs.primary_reasoning: Parallel staffing restoration preserves both facilities; cross-facility model prevents recurrence
counter_claims: CFO raised agency cost concern ($180K/week) — accepted as necessary for compliance
General CNO argued Community should absorb more surge — rejected due to L&D minimum staffing

new_edges: Staffing reallocation → system-level approval when any facility within 10% of minimum
Census surge trigger → automatic travel nurse pool freeze at all facilities
